member.name: T:Microsoft.MixedReality.QR.QRCode
member.summary: Encapsulates information about a labeled spatial anchored element.
member.remarks: This type if the 'glue' between spatial anchors (which have no meaning attached to them) and App Holograms. SpatialEntity are designed to work as 'spatial labels' in the world. Proximity can be used to discover content attached to SpatialAnchors. In addition, SpatialEntities can be shared across devices/users.

member.name: P:Microsoft.MixedReality.QR.QRCode.Id
member.summary: Unique id that identifies this QR code for this session.

member.name: P:Microsoft.MixedReality.QR.QRCode.SpatialGraphNodeId
member.summary: Spatial graph node id that for this QR code to create a coordinate system.

member.name: P:Microsoft.MixedReality.QR.QRCode.Version
member.summary: Version of this QR code. Version 1 -40 are regular QRCodes and 41-44 are the Micro QRCode 1-4

member.name: P:Microsoft.MixedReality.QR.QRCode.PhysicalSideLength
member.summary: Physical width or height of this QR code in Meters.

member.name: P:Microsoft.MixedReality.QR.QRCode.Data
member.summary: QR code Data.

member.name: P:Microsoft.MixedReality.QR.QRCode.RawDataSize
member.summary: Size of the RawData of this QR code.

member.name: M:Microsoft.MixedReality.QR.QRCode.GetRawData(System.Byte[])
member.summary: QR code Get the CodeRawData copy, this is the error corrected raw data bytes. Used when the platform is unable to decode the encoding and user can decode as needed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.MixedReality.QR.QRCode.SystemRelativeLastDetectedTime
member.summary: QR code last detected system relative time in 100ns ticks.

member.name: P:Microsoft.MixedReality.QR.QRCode.LastDetectedTime
member.summary: QR code last detected time.

member.name: T:Microsoft.MixedReality.QR.QRCodeWatcher
member.summary: QRTracker

member.summary: Is QR Codes feature supported.

member.name: M:Microsoft.MixedReality.QR.QRCodeWatcher.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new QRTracker.

member.name: M:Microsoft.MixedReality.QR.QRCodeWatcher.Start
member.summary: Starts tracking QR codes Start should only be called once the RequestAccessAsync has succeeded. Should not be called if the feature is not supported, check the IsSupported to see if this feature is supported. Raises exceptions E_ACCESSDENIED, E_NOT_VALID_STATE, ERROR_NOT_SUPPORTED

member.name: M:Microsoft.MixedReality.QR.QRCodeWatcher.Stop
member.summary: Stops tracking QR codes.

member.summary: Get the list of QR codes detected.
